item.title: ProgramMur - Programmer's Murmur Redefine + Newsletter
item.author: programmur.tw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description:
Kyoto KÅdai-ji Temple, Hideyoshi Toyotomi, Goshuincho Dream Yume

2023-04-04 A thousand expectations I originally wanted to release on April Fool’s Day.

Recently, thanks to ChatGPT, I have made many new friends. I am very grateful for the attention and hope that I can continue to present insightful knowledge points to you. In summary, I will define the positioning of this blog, the content I expect to cover, and try to launch a free newsletter. If you have any feedback or ideas, please feel free to send a private message or email. Let’s grow together and explore the journey of technology/life.

ðŸ¤” Q: What knowledge do you want to gain?

ðŸ’ª A: Subscribe to the newsletter!
